title: Services Week 2024
authors: Ella Boyer, Senior Communications and Events Manager, CDDO
Marc O’Connor, Lead Service Designer, HMRC
Andy Jones, Head of Profession for Design, DfE
Kara Kane, Head of Profession for Design, GDS
Angie Dickinson, Senior Communications Manager, CDDO

content.text: We’re delighted to share that Services Week is returning for the sixth time this year and will be taking place from 18 to 22 March 2024. Services Week is an annual event series run by the Government Digital and Data community for people working in the UK public sector.
It’s not too late to showcase your work at Services Week 2024, read how you can get involved in the Services in Government blog.
If you have any questions about Services Week 2024 please get in touch.
We look forward to seeing you there!
